A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: felt let down after seeing TLJ....Mark H carried the movie despite having limited screen time...the/DisneyHumor parts really made things uncomfortable and it was very unlike the SW we are used to....plot holes never filled in most cases...felt like it was all just thrown together with alot of re-tread moments and new characters that had NO REAL substance in regards to the story...I stayed away from spoilers and the internet on this one so I can try and get some of that SW magic.It never showed up...Rouge One was soooo much better...
